moderator.label: Moderator
moderator.description: The flow of the game lives and dies by the Moderator's hand. They are the sole player that knows the role of each player, and walks the rest of the players through day, night and death the following morning. It's their job to keep the game moving, so some Moderators opt for a 5 minute time limit during the day for everyone to decide who to kill off. They also are the one who calls for a vote when a nominee to be killed off has arisen. The Moderator may find it helpful to use the app to keep track of each role and who has been killed that night should there be a large quantity of players.

werewolf.label: Werewolf
werewolf.description: The goal of the werewolves is to decide on one villager to secretly kill off during the night, while posing as villagers during the day so they're not killed off themselves.

villager.label: Villager
villager.description: The goal of the villagers is to identify and eliminate all werewolves before they are killed off themselves. They have no special abilities, but can vote to eliminate a player during the day.

doctor.label: Doctor
doctor.description: The doctor can choose one player to heal each night, preventing them from being killed by the werewolves.

detective.label: Detective
detective.description: The detective can investigate one player each night to determine if they are a werewolf or not.

witch.label: Witch
witch.description: The Witch has the additional powers of one potion and one poison, which they may use at any point throughout the game. They can only use one per evening until both are gone, and have the ability to save them until a point in the game they deem fit.
witch.shortDescription: Heal the Innocent, Kill the Werewolves!

drunk.label: Drunk
drunk.description: Also a villager, the Drunk has the additional burden of only being able to communicate with gestures or noises. They may not talk during the day at all, and if they do, automatically die during that night.

vigilante.label: Vigilante
vigilante.description: The Vigilante has the ability to kill another villager each night, but if the villager you kill is not a Werewolf, you will commit suicide the next night out of guilt

cursed.label: Cursed
cursed.description: The Cursed think they are regular villagers, but they were cursed with the mark of the wolf at birth and are seen as members of the wolfpack by the detective.
